title: Bug 104024combining varargs and inner classes crashes the parser
description: class Outer {public class Inner {}}public class Bug {public void varargs(Object... varargs) {}public void test() {Outer.Inner inner = new Outer().new Inner();varargs(inner); // worksvarargs(new Outer().new Inner()); // crashes}}
